congrats.body-welcome: We warmly welcome you to our community! We're delighted to have you here. You're just one step away from enjoying your favorite games for free. Finish creating your game account and start playing now!
congrats.disclaimer: We guarantee the complete security of your data, and you retain full control over your information. If you decide to unsubscribe at any time, we will completely delete all your data from our system.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us at Wow Libre is like the special ingredient of your amazing experience! The more we know, the better we can make you experience something truly extraordinary. So, share those details with us and get ready for something out of this world!

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you'll use when logging into websites and mobile apps.

bank.title: Master Azeroth with an Exclusive Gold Loan!
bank.description: Elevate your adventure in Azeroth to an epic level with our Gold Loan. Get the financing you need to enhance your gear, expand your treasure collection, or simply enjoy the best in-game experiences to the fullest.

benefits.primary: Apply for your loan and receive your money today.

bank.disclaimer: Loans have interest. Check the 'Loan Guide' section for more details.

primary.title: Payment Notifications
primary.description: You will receive in-game notifications to remind you when your loan is due.

secondary.title: Grace Period
secondary.description: If you don't pay on time, you will have a 15-day grace period to catch up before penalties are applied.

tertiary.title: Consequences of Default
tertiary.description: If you fail to pay, the system will automatically deduct the owed gold from your accounts. If there isn't enough gold, in-game items of equivalent value will be deducted.

loan_guide.title: Loan Guide
loan_guide.complementary_subtitle: Choose the one that best suits your needs

secondary.title: Choose the Ideal Plan for You
secondary.description: Select the perfect plan that fits your needs and enhances your experience.

tertiary.title: Your Gold Package is on its Way!
tertiary.description: In a few minutes, check your in-game mail to receive your valuable package.

quaternary.title: Remember Timely Payment!
quaternary.description: Enjoy the newly arrived gold in your game, but don't forget the payment due date.

plans.title: Discover Our Plans!
plans.subtitle: Clear prices tailored to your needs. Total transparency so you can choose the best for your account!

testimony.title: Hello! 👋
testimony.primary_paragraph: In a distant region of Azeroth, there was once an adventurer named Fizzle who, tempted by an offer of easy gold, decided to take out a loan without thinking twice. Although the gold promised to improve his gear and fill his coffers with treasures, he soon discovered that debts and unfulfilled promises became an overwhelming burden.
testimony.secondary_paragraph: Fizzle learned the hard way: sometimes, greed can lead us down dark paths. Instead of accepting the gold without considering the consequences, it's better to carefully evaluate our options and choose paths that don't lead to despair.
testimony.tertiary_paragraph: So, before making a decision, think it over. Gold may shine, but freedom and peace of mind are far more valuable.

bank_characters.title: Character Selection
bank_characters.description: Choose the character to request the loan. If some characters don't appear, it's because they don't meet the loan requirements.
bank_characters.success-loan: Haha, you've got your gold! But remember, my friend, this deal fills my pockets too. Don't forget your payments, or the interest will make me smile even more!

errors.fails_to_obtain_accounts: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your accounts. Please try again later!
errors.fails_to_obtain_characters: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your characters. Please try again later!

availability.title: Forge Your Legend: Explore the Guilds of Azeroth
availability.description: Discover a world of camaraderie and epic adventures. Find your perfect community among the legendary guilds of World of Warcraft, where friendship and strategy unite to challenge the boundaries of Azeroth.

no-availability.title: No guilds found!
no-availability.description: Be part of the adventure and leave your mark in Azeroth! Create your own guild and gather other heroes to face epic challenges and conquer new horizons. Don’t wait any longer, your legacy is waiting for you!

loading.title: Loading guilds, please wait
loading.description: We are searching for the available guilds on this server. Please hold on!

incentive.title: Benefits of Belonging to a Guild
incentive.description: Joining a community of players in an MMORPG offers a unique and enriching experience. It allows you to connect with other passionate players, collaborate on exciting challenges, and access exclusive resources that will enhance your gaming experience.

competition.title: Compete with Other Guilds
competition.description: Participate in competitions so your guild can earn exclusive benefits for its members.

events.title: Events of the
events.description: Prizes obtained will be awarded to all guild members during the event. After this period, the challenges will be updated and must be completed again to acquire the benefits.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Obtained
benefits.disclaimer: By joining this guild, you can obtain the following benefits:
benefits.no-benefits: This guild has no benefits yet

primary.title: Global Event: Resilience in the Capitalist Era
primary.description: Guild leaders hold the power to transform the wealth of their members into unique prizes and exclusive benefits. Join the resistance and help your guild conquer new horizons in this global challenge.

secondary.title: Guild Rewards
secondary.description: Every reward earned by the guild opens the door to exclusive benefits for all its members. Participate and make sure each victory is yours too!

home-servers.title: Vote for our servers

home-servers.empty-server-list-subtitle: There are currently no services available, but our brave professionals are honing their skills to offer you the best experiences.

friend.title: ⚔️ Choose Your Hero! ⚔️
friend.subtitle: In Azeroth, true strength lies in friendship. Add your allies and embark on epic adventures!
friend.text: Together, you’ll face challenges and celebrate victories. Friendship is the most powerful magic of all!

mails.title: ⚔️ Choose Your Hero! ⚔️
mails.subtitle: Communication is key in the world of Warcraft. Send letters and messages to your friends and allies!
mails.text: Share your adventures, strategies, and secrets. Every word matters in the battle for Azeroth's destiny!

professions.title: ⚔️ Choose Your Hero! ⚔️
professions.subtitle: Become a master blacksmith, alchemist, or even an enchanting sage! The possibilities are endless... choose your path within the game!
professions.text: The key to power is in your hands. Professions will take you to the next level!

guilds.title: ⚔️ Choose Your Hero! ⚔️
guilds.subtitle: Azeroth's strength lies in unity. Join a powerful guild and fight alongside your friends!
guilds.text: Together, you can conquer great challenges and forge an eternal legacy. The adventure starts here!

premium.title: ⚔️ Choose Your Champion! ⚔️
premium.subtitle: Make the most of your subscription privileges
premium.text: Unlock your hero's full potential with exclusive benefits. Make every battle count!

promotions.title: ⚔️ Forge Your Destiny! ⚔️
promotions.subtitle: Take advantage of legendary offers

team.title: An Experienced and Passionate Team at Your Service
team.subtitle: Top experts in their field, ready for every challenge.

section-one.title: Reset Your Password
section-one.sub-title: Regain access to your account and continue enjoying our services without interruption. Complete the form below to reset your password and secure your account.
section-one.success-message: Email sent. Please check your inbox and use the code within the next 3 minutes.
section-one.error-send-message: Error sending the email. Please try again.

section-two.title: Verify Your Security Code

section-two.disclaimer: Reminder: The security code is only valid for 3 minutes.
section-two.success-message: We have sent a temporary password to your email. Use it to access your account and be sure to update it to a secure password once you're logged in.

home-products.title: Incredible Offers
home-products.subtitle: Don’t miss out on the most irresistible promotions just for you! Take advantage now!

offer-day.title: Exclusive Offer of the Day!
offer-day.disclaimer: Discover the most amazing promotions only for today!

home-information.title: Join Today!
home-information.description: Discover an innovative platform designed to provide you with advanced tools and an unparalleled gaming experience. Join now and take your community to the next level!

push-deploy.title: Continuous Improvements.
push-deploy.description: Our platform is constantly evolving with new features and optimizations to enhance your experience.

certificates.title: Guaranteed Security.
certificates.description: We safeguard your information with SSL security certificates and advanced protocols to ensure a safe and reliable experience.

database.title: Your Data is Always Protected.
database.description: We perform regular backups to keep your information secure at all times. Your account and progress are fully protected!

home-information.congrats: Your feedback is essential to us. If you have any suggestions for improvements, feel free to share them. Together, we make this community thrive!

notice.title: Your Adventure is Safe!
notice.description: We protect your information with the highest security standards. Enjoy your experience worry-free and with complete confidence.

home-us.sub-title: Find the perfect server for you and live adventures you’ll never forget.

primary.title: An Unmatched and Unique Experience!
primary.description: Dare to face the Lich King with our innovative auto-balancing system, allowing you to complete dungeons solo or with a small group of adventurers. Enjoy the final content of the expansion without complications or limits.

secondary.title: An Unmatched Experience!
secondary.description: On February 1st, our community will launch a progressive WoW 3.3.5 realm with a Twink theme. Every week, new levels will be unlocked for you to enjoy a unique experience.

subscription.title: Azeroth Epic Pass
subscription.description: Subscribe and enjoy the best benefits at an incredible price.
subscription.disclaimer: By subscribing, you accept WowLibre's Terms and Conditions. You can cancel anytime.

primary.title: Free Services
primary.description: Change faction or rename your characters, all completely free!

secondary.title: Free Items and Mounts Upon Subscription!
secondary.description: Get exclusive free items and mounts as a reward for supporting the community. Subscribe now and start enjoying these amazing benefits!

benefits-vip.title: Prizes!
benefits-vip.description: Prizes vary by server. Some of the prizes shown below are specifically distributed for each one.

adversing.title: Irresistible Promotional Plan!
adversing.description: Don't miss this opportunity and enjoy all the benefits of a premium subscription!

partners.title: Partner Servers
partners.description: Your subscription benefits are automatically applied to all integrated realms and servers in the WoW Libre community.

payment-methods.title: Special Price
payment-methods.disclaimer: By subscribing, you accept WowLibre's Terms and Conditions. You can cancel anytime.

features-server.title: Discover Our Updates
features-server.short-description: Stay informed daily about the changes and improvements we make to our servers. We're always working to provide you with the best gaming experience!
features-server.detailed-description: Our team of experts is committed to delivering the best gaming experience. We constantly work on improving our servers to offer you an optimal gaming environment. We're always here to help!
features-server.summary: We're always working to provide you with the best gaming experience!

home-who-we-are.title: Ready to get started?
home-who-we-are.description: If you need to download the game, any addons, or other tools to fully enjoy the experience, you’re in the right place! Here you'll find everything you need to begin your adventure in Azeroth.

footer.about: @WowLibre We develop innovative solutions for the gaming community. We enhance the gaming experience with advanced software, fostering the creation of unique and immersive worlds.

plans-and-pricing.title: Plans and Pricing
plans-and-pricing.description: Choose a plan and let our team of experts handle the setup. Just enjoy the growth!

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Discover the most exciting events on our server. Don't miss out!

subscription-active.title: Subscription Active!
subscription-active.description: Enjoy all the benefits of your premium subscription. Make the most of your gaming experience!
subscription-active.disclaimer: Explore all the advantages available to you and get the most out of your subscription.

subscription-inactive.title: Join and Unlock Exclusive Benefits
subscription-inactive.description: Get early access to exclusive content, special discounts, and a limitless experience. Become a member today and take your experience to the next level!

notice.title: News
notice.description: Discover the latest news from our server.

services.title: Take Your Project to the Next Level
services.sub-title: Launch your project in minutes, hassle-free. We help you set up your server and integrate advanced tools so you can focus on what truly matters: your project.

features.new-relic-description: We monitor your application's performance and help you identify performance issues and real-time errors.
features.terminal-description: We help you configure your server in minutes, so you can start working on your project without wasting time.
features.security-description: We provide advanced security systems that protect your server and application from external attacks and threats.
features.website-description: We deploy your website in minutes and provide support so you can focus on what truly matters: your community.

features.title: Don't Wait, Start Today.
features.subtitle: Get your server today and start enjoying all the benefits we offer.

update-push.title: Instant Updates
update-push.description: Your website is automatically deployed with every update, giving you immediate access to the latest features and improvements.

ssl-certificate.title: SSL Certificates
ssl-certificate.description: We include SSL certificates so your website is always safe and secure.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Access an intuitive and easy-to-use admin panel. Manage your server and project from one place.

vps.title: VPS and Dedicated Servers
vps.description: Monitor your server’s performance and availability. We help you identify performance issues and real-time errors.

support.title: 24/7 Technical Support
support.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with any issue or question you might have.

domain.title: Domain Included
domain.description: We include a free domain so your website is always available and accessible.

marketing.title: Marketing and Advertising
marketing.description: We help you promote your project and attract new users.

dowload-resources.title: Downloadable Resources
dowload-resources.description: Download useful tools and resources for your project. We help you find what you need.

new-relic.title: 24/7 Monitoring
new-relic.description: Server performance and availability monitoring. We help you identify performance issues and real-time errors.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.descripcion: Explore our integrations gallery and discover how to take your project to the next level.

header-plataform.title: Boost Your Project with
header-plataform.subtitle: Our Platform
header-plataform.description: Connect your project with our community and create a unique experience. Use our tools to attract more users.

guide-documentation.title: Integration Guide
guide-documentation.description: Follow our integration guide to connect your server to our platform. We help you set up your server and integrate advanced tools so you can focus on what truly matters: your project.

step1.title: 1. Create an Account on the Platform
step1.description: To get started, you must register on the platform. Access the following link and complete the registration form:

step2.title: 2. Verify Your Email
step2.description: After registering, you'll receive an email to verify your account. This step is mandatory before continuing with server linking.

step3.title: 3. Linking Panel
step3.description: Enjoy all the benefits we offer.

vinculation-server.title: Server Linking
vinculation-server.description: Connect your server to our platform in just three steps.

step1.title: Access the Server Panel
step1.description: Access the server panel to link your server. From this panel, you'll be able to view and manage all servers connected to our platform.

step2.title: Configure Your Server
step2.description: In this section, you’ll need to provide essential data to complete the server linking successfully.

step3.title: Link and Verify
step3.description: Once you submit the request, our platform will start communicating with the Java application, which you must download and run on your server.

detail-request-server.title: Required Field Details
detail-request-server.description: Make sure to correctly fill in each field for a successful linking.

name-server.title: Server Name
name-server.description: Specify the name you want to use to identify your server on the platform.

web.title: Website
web.description: Provide the official link where players can get information and register. You can use your own website or our official domain: www.wowlibre.com/register.

expansion.title: Expansion
expansion.description: Select the game expansion your server uses.

host.title: Host
host.description: Provide the public IP address of your server. This is essential for communication with our platform. If you use a domain, be sure to include it.
host.description-two: Also, it’s crucial to specify the port on which the application is listening. If you haven’t changed the default settings, the default port is

realmlist.title: Realmlist
realmlist.description: Provide your server’s realmlist so the community can connect to it.

type-server.title: Server Type
type-server.description: We currently offer three server categories: INSTANT, BLIZZLIKE, and CUSTOM. Choose the category that best describes your server's setup. This field is informational and does not affect the linking process.

password.title: Password
password.description: Create a password that will be used on the server admin panel to make changes. This adds an extra layer of security to protect your server access and settings.

credentials-external.title: External Credentials
credentials-external.description: These credentials are essential for our platform to securely communicate with the application. They allow us to ensure only WoW Libre can access the exposed APIs.

configuration-server.title: Application Configuration
configuration-server.description: This step is essential, as the application enables secure and efficient communication with your infrastructure.

guide.title: Configuration Guide
guide.description: This web application is developed in Java, using the Spring framework and based on a microservices architecture.

step1.title: 1. Download Application
step1.description: The source code is open and constantly improved to optimize performance and add new features. We also provide a compiled JAR file ready to download and use easily.

step2.title: 2. Copy API Key
step2.description: If you’ve followed the previous steps, go to the
step2.description-two: section, where you’ll see all linked servers. You’ll find a column called 'API Key', from where you can easily copy your key.

step3.title: 3. Installation and Execution
step3.description: Before launching the Java application, some setup steps are required, including installing and configuring environment variables depending on your operating system.

windows.title: Follow these steps to install Java JDK 17, and create and configure the service on Windows:

step1.title: Download and install Java JDK 17 from the official Oracle website or adoptium.net:

step2.title: During installation, make sure to add Java to the system PATH.

step3.title: Verify the installation by running the following in the terminal:

step4.title: Create a batch file (`wow-libre-client.bat`) with the following content:

step5.title: Save the file and place it in the folder where the application will be located.

step6.title: To run the service manually, double-click on `wow-libre-client.bat`.

step7.title: If you want it to run automatically at Windows startup, create a shortcut to the `.bat` file in the `shell:startup` folder.

step8.title: Make sure to place the downloaded `.jar` file in the folder specified in the script. In this example, the used path is
step8.description: but you can change it to suit your needs. To move the file, you can use File Explorer or the following command in cmd:

linux.title: Follow these steps to install Java JDK 17, and create and configure the service on Linux:

step2.title: Install Java JDK 17 by running the following command:

step4.title: Create the service file with the following command:

step5.title: Add the following content to the file:

step6.title: Save the changes and close the editor (`CTRL + X`, then `Y` and `ENTER`).

step7.title: Reload systemd services to apply the configuration:

step8.title: Enable the service to start automatically with the system:

step10.title: Check that the service is running correctly:

step11.title: Note: Make sure to place the downloaded `.jar` file in the folder specified in WorkingDirectory. In this example, the path used is /root/app/, but you can change it to suit your needs. To move the file, you can use the following command:

step12.title: Note: As a final step, it is necessary to enable SOAP in the emulator by editing the worldserver.conf file. This will allow the platform to communicate with the application and automate processes through the emulator’s commands.
